description:
With Luffy and the others recovering from Pica`s attack, the game is afoot! Luffy has just enough time to regroup and set out to find Doflamingo, only to find that the dastardly Warlord has more enemies than he might realize! A strange argument breaks out - to decide who gets to take down Doflamingo once and for all!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Daishuuketsu! Luffy to Kyouaku Senshi Gundan
Gathering into a Powerful Front! Luffy and a Group of Brutal Warriors!
Tout le monde sur le pont. Luffy et les affreux !
¡Gran reunión! Luffy y el ejército de fugitivos
Объединившись в могучий отряд. Луффи и группа брутальных воинов
الاجتماع في طليعة قويّة! لوفي ومجموعة من المحاربين الغاشمين!
大集結! ルフィと凶悪戦士軍団
